message.content:
```python
def format_number(n):
    """
    This function takes a number as input parameter and returns the formatted number with commas as thousands separators.
    """
    s = str(n)
    # Adding commas as thousands separator
    s = s.replace(",", ".")
    # Reverse string to add comma at right position
    s = s[::-1]
    return s
```
